text: wlqd 'ahlakna al'umam alty kdhdhabt rusul allah min qablikum -ayha almushrikun brbhm- lmma ashrku, waja'athum rusuluhum min eind allah balmejzat alwadhat walhjj alty tabayan sidq man ja' bha, falam takun hadhih al'umam alty 'ahlaknaha ltsdq rslha wtnqad lha, fasthqu alhlak, wamathal dhlk al'ihlak najzi kula mjrm mtjawz hudud allh
